'''''Spirits Adrift, Alas, in Water''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to activate the whirlpool during the {{Quest|Floating Jade, Treasure of Chenyu}}.

==Trivia==
*The achievement's name is a reference to a poem written by {{w|Qu Yuan}} called the {{w|Jiu Ge|Nine Songs}}: 灵何惟兮水中？乘白鼋兮逐文鱼， 与女游兮河之渚，流澌纷兮将来下。(''O Hebo why do you reside in these waters? Riding the large tortoise and carp following beside you, swimming alongside you in the river, the boundless river-waters slowly streaming east.'') The poem is dedicated to the deity {{w|Hebo}}, god of the Yellow River, as a rite of praise.
